description:
Kunikida asks the government to give the TAC a chance to stop the Aragami without sacrificing Momiji and everyone spends one day with their loved ones before the final battle begins.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le soleil couchant, le jour qui arrive. Temps seul pour chacun d’entre nous.
Shizumu Hi Semaru Hi Sorezore no Toki
The Setting Sun! The Coming Day! A Private Time for Each of Us!
沈む陽 迫る日 それぞれの時
